The 'olive ridley sea turtle' (Lepidochelys olivacea), also known as the
'Pacific ridley sea turtle', is a medium-sized species of sea turtle found in
warm and tropical waters, primarily in the Pacific and Indian Oceans.
wiki.title: Olive%20ridley%20sea%20turtle
